description:
Spring. The Hatase High school gymnasium. Table tennis club adviser Koizumi Jo notices a cut-man with glasses on the team.
He is one of the up-and-comers who joined the team this year, Tsukimoto Makoto (Smile).
Meanwhile, the other up-and-comer Hoshino Yutaka (Peco) is swindling a man at Obaba`s Tamura Table Tennis Hall.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Oto ga Jama o Shiteiru
Le bruit du vent nous gène
The Wind Makes It Too Hard to Hear
風の音がジャマをしている
